name: Dr Monkey's Alien Blaster
description:
Old fashioned 2D Scroller Game created for Video Game Design Course

Blast your way through the alien enemies with your rocket ship as you fly through the gamespace in a retro 2D Scroller Game!

Latest Update: Added Level 5 where you navigate an asteroid field all the while avoiding chasing and spawning asteroids!

Special Features:

  • Main Menu: Customized user interface, instructions page, and Levels links
  • All Levels: Each level has its own background, music, enemy types and behaviors
  • Levels 2–4: Dodge added asteroids, and move through an expanded game space
  • Level 3–4: Dodge moving asteroids, and faster and more difficult to kill enemies.
  • Level 4: Absolutely insane! Enemies with dynamic movement, varying strength, speed, and types. New addition of 3 asteroids that track the player to deal damage.
  • UI: Mini-map camera on the lower left shows the entire game space

Created by D.S. Rose
